basics.name: Michael Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: An english and math tutor for elementry to high school level students
highlights: Provided academic support and mentorship to students by fostering a collaborative learning environment
Helped maintain the company by ensuring effiecent production of critical documents

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
